subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nets center Josh Boone watched but did not participate in Saturday’s practice, a day after he experienced chest discomfort and went to the hospital as a precaution. Boone stayed behind as the team traveled to Boston to play the Celtics in a preseason game. He is scheduled to be evaluated Monday.
